DisplayForm.Script:
<UiScreen infoLevel="Normal"> <Title>title</Title> <AutoTransition>10</AutoTransition> <Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="./15.xml"> <Label imgsrc="submit.jpg">Submit</Label> </Op> <Op type="SkipGo" action="./3.xml"> <Label imgsrc="skipgo.jpg">Skipgo</Label> </Op> <Op type="Back" action="./13.xml"> <Label imgsrc="back.jpg">Back</Label> </Op> </Operations> <LinkScreen> <Description>Description (長野県 India Qatar 石川県 VietNam )</Description>
<!-- --> <EitherOrControl> <ItemY href="./11.xml"> <Label imgsrc="imageY.jpg">Label text for ImageY.jpg</Label> </ItemY> <ItemN href="./21.xml"> <Label imgsrc="imageN.jpg">Label text for ImageN.jpg</Label> </ItemN> </EitherOrControl>
</LinkScreen> </UiScreen>
